q: how can i rent a house
a: To rent on HouseMart, browse listings, click 'Request to Rent', and fill in your details. The landlord or agent will contact you to finalize inspection and payment. Make sure to review the property details and schedule a viewing if needed.

q: how do i buy a house
a: Buying is easy! Go to the 'Buy' section, search by location or price, and contact the agent directly. HouseMart ensures listings are verified for safety. You can also filter by property type, size, and amenities.

q: how do i list my property
a: To list your property, log into your account, click 'Add Listing', upload images, add price and details, and publish. Your property will go live immediately after verification. Make sure your photos are clear and details accurate for faster interest.

q: how can i become an agent
a: To join as an agent, sign up for a HouseMart account and select 'Agent Account' during registration. You’ll get access to tools to manage your listings, communicate with clients, and promote properties.

q: how can i become a customer
a: To join as a customer, sign up for a HouseMart account and select 'Customer Account' during registration. You’ll get access to browse listings, save favorites, and contact agents directly.

q: how do i reset my password
a: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your email, and we'll send you a reset link immediately. Follow the instructions in the email to reset your password safely.

q: how can i verify a listing
a: HouseMart verifies listings before approval. Verified listings show a green 'Verified Badge'. Always check for that badge before contacting any agent to avoid scams.

q: how can i update my profile
